entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.5°C
